content: the wrapped arrow beanie is a very textured and soft hat that you can make for the entire family this beanie has a fitted style and looks good both with and without a pompom the pattern comes with detailed step-by-step photos and a link to a video tutorial on how to crochet the wrapped arrow stitch **materials** 5 0-mm h/8 us 6 uk crochet hook 5 5-mm i/9 us 5 uk crochet hook worsted 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn suggestions** i used stylecraft special aran feel free to use any aran weight yarn that meets gauge **yardage** **12-24 months** - 110 yds 100 m **child** - 122 yds 112 m **adult m** - 161 yds 147 m this pattern is written in us terms **size** the pattern is written in 3 sizes **12-24 months** - 17-18 43-46 cm **child** - 19-20 48-51 cm **adult m** - 22 56 cm **gauge** using your 5 5-mm hook 13 sts for 5 repeats of the wrapped arrow stitch in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 2 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
